00006 package ScheatorDb;
00007 import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
00008 import java.sql.*;
00009 
00014 public class Teams extends DbObject {
00015 
00016     private static final String[] TABLE_NAME = {"Team"};
00017     private static final String[] ID_FIELDS = {"ID"};
00018     private static final String[] FIELDS = {"ID", "Name"};
00019     
00020     Teams() {
00021         list = new LinkedHashMap<Integer, Data>();
00022         db = new MySqlDb();
00023     }
00024 
00025     Teams(int seasonId) {
00026         list = new LinkedHashMap<Integer, Data>();
00027         db = new MySqlDb();
00028         fetch(seasonId);
00029     }
00030 
00031     public void fetch(int seasonId) {
00032         String[] ids = null;
00033 
00034         if (seasonId != 0) {
00035             ids = new String[1];
00036             ids[0] = String.valueOf(seasonId);
00037         }
00038         
00039         list.clear();
00040 
00041         try {
00042             Statement st = db.con.createStatement();
00043             ResultSet rs = st.executeQuery(db.qe.getItems(TABLE_NAME, FIELDS, ID_FIELDS , ids, null));
00044             while (rs.next()) {
00045                 String id = rs.getString(FIELDS[0]);
00046                 String name = rs.getString(FIELDS[1]);
00047                 Data team = new Data(Integer.parseInt(id.trim()), name);
00048                 list.put(id, team);
00049             }
00050         } catch (Exception e) {
00051             System.err.println("Failed to read season data: " + e.toString());
00052         }
00053 
00054     }
00055 
00056     public class Data extends DbObject.Data {
00057         
00058         Data() {
00059             field_id = 0;
00060             field_name = "";
00061         }
00062 
00063         Data (String name) {
00064             field_id = 0;
00065             field_name = name;
00066         }
00067         
00068         Data(int id, String name) {
00069             field_id = id;
00070             field_name = name;
00071         }
00072     }
00073 
00074 }
